title: Namespaces crash course
summary: As an XML dialect, SVG is namespaced. It is important to understand the concept of namespaces and how they are used if you plan to author SVG content. Namespaces are essential to user agents that support multiple XML dialects; browsers must be very strict. Taking the time to understand namespaces now will save you from future headaches.
pageTitle: Namespaces crash course - SVG: Scalable Vector Graphics | MDN
